text.section: The Department or a private or public entity shall issue a certificate to any applicant who meets the requirements of this subtitle.

Each certificate shall include:
The kind of certificate;
The full name of the certificate holder; and
A serial number.
A replacement certificate may be issued to replace a lost, destroyed, or mutilated certificate if the certificate holder pays the certificate replacement fee.

section.section: The certificate shall be valid for 1 year.

In order to renew the certificate for an additional year, the applicant shall:
Successfully complete a refresher training program approved by the Department; or
Demonstrate proficiency to the Department or a private or public entity issuing certificates under this subtitle.
